column2: Session cookies allow the website to recognize you as you navigate between pages during a single browser session and allow you to use the website most efficiently. For example, session cookies enable a website to remember that a user has placed items in an online shopping basket.
They therefore enable the website to "recognize" you on your return remember your preferences and tailor services to you.
which are set by the website which you have chosen to visit, such as this website, in order to provide us or third parties with information.
